plot outline: Srujan, a technical engineer working in a car company is smitten by his colleague Amita Kulal and as they prepare together to go to a foreign location for an onsite assignment it draws the jealousy and ire of the fellow team members, especially Manoj who has a crush on Amita. To prevent Srujan and Amita from going abroad, Manoj sabotages Srujan and sends goons to threaten and humiliate him in front of everyone in the office. Feeling humiliated and also dejected by Amita's rejection of his proposal, Srujan decides to quit and goes back to his native. Two months later, he calls one of his colleagues and tells him that he wants to apologize and calls everyone to his home. However, does he have an ulterior motive or he really feels apologetic forms the crux.
title: Happy Journey

Feeling humiliated and also dejected by Amita's rejection of his proposal, Srujan decides to quit and goes back to his native. Two months later, he calls one of his colleagues and tells him that he wants to apologize and calls everyone to his home.
